title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has a confusing message
description: When using the New Package Wizard, the message displayed is confusing and needs clarification.
OB: The message displayed in the New Package Wizard is unclear and difficult to understand.
EB: The message in the New Package Wizard should be clear and provide clear instructions for creating a new package.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project. 
2. Select the project. 
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
